name: Just Another Space Shooter (Kaideu, KallivdH)
description:
This is a collaboration project for our first game jam, Tutorial Jam!

We did what we could in a single weekend learning a new engine. Unfortunately, the new engine seemed to have bugs in it or didn't give a full understanding of a couple things. The code broke in a few places while not in others and we aren't sure why. Such as The same object being instantiated over and over (enemy ships *cough cough*) should all act the same other than ship speed. However, the ray cast for the shooting doesn't pick up some of them, and we don't know why haha

We also wanted to add a few more things but lacked the time at the end =(

Might still update though!

Nevertheless, we hope you enjoy our first released game!

**Side note**If the Main .exe doesn't work for you, try the V1.1! One of our developers had issues opening the .exe in Main and we are not sure why!

*V1.1 Not updated yet*

Special Thanks to the uploaders of these!

https://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/off-limits/
